attributes.action: Give pensioners help to pay local authority rates.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many pensioners have incomes / assets , only just above the level at which they can claim  benefits,more often than not due to their careful saving towards retirement .In particular because of the above inflation levels of council tax increases ,compared to the low levels of increases to pensions it is becoming impossible for the elderly to fund this unfair burden . We submit therefore that a graduated scale of relief should be brought in for all those persons over 65 years of age , who are not already in receipt of benefits.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
